TextBody:
Hello Amy,

Thank you for contacting the Netwrix Support support team.

At the moment Endpoint Protector does not have WSL as an exit point under the applications so currently it is not possible to enforce polices on this application.  A feature request can be made to our R&D team, we can submit a request to add this application as an exit point to Endpoint Protector and then relay our Product team's response back to you.


Kind regards
__________________
André Le Roux | Technical Support Engineer
Endpoint Protector by CoSoSys, now part of Netwrix
DLP | Device Control | Content Aware Protection | eDiscovery | Enforced Encryption
www.endpointprotector.com

This Email may contain confidential information. Not to be disclosed to third parties without prior written approval.

Hello Amy,

I wanted to check in regarding your support ticket 00426166. We haven’t heard from you in a while, and I just wanted to see if you still need assistance with this issue.

If you’re still experiencing problems or have any updates to share, please let me know. If the issue has been resolved, I can go ahead and close the ticket on my end.

Please feel free to reply to this email with any updates or questions. We’re here to help you get the most out of your Netwrix products.

Ticket Subject: Prevent WSL from uploading files to the external network
Ticket Details: Can DLP prevent WSL from uploading files to the external network, Just like the windows host restrictions ? How ? Thanks.

Thank you!
